comment_move.error_not: The selected item is not a task. Select a task from the list

personal.title: Do you want to share the task?
personal.render_assign_all_task: To make the whole task visible and to receive comments.
personal.render_assign_top:
User %%user%% (%%login%%) does not see this task. It consists in organizations:
%%orgs%%
Choose what you want to do:
personal.render_note_top: In the table below, please indicate which of these users need to make the added comment visible:
personal.render_note_bot: Note: If you do not have a dialogue with these users or do not know who it is, just click Accept, without selecting anyone in the table.

errors_text.fired_user:
User %%users%% consists of a group of laid-off employees.
Users of this group can not comment.
errors_text.fired_users:
Users %%users%% are in the group of laid-off employees.
Users of this group can not comment.
